message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to offer it to you for $22,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $14,000 is too low for me to consider. This product is truly top-of-the-line and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. How about we meet in the middle at $19,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I still feel that $14,000 is a fair price given my budget constraints. I would like to stick to that figure.
